fields.request: Verify WhatsApp chat bridge forwards visitor conversations
fields.request_details:
1. Configure a WhatsApp chat bridge with a test phone number ID and access token, enabling it as the default client.
2. Send an inbound WhatsApp-style webhook payload to the new /webhooks/whatsapp/ endpoint and confirm the session appears in the chat admin with the sender recorded.
3. Reply to the same chat as staff from the admin widget and verify the WhatsApp API receives the outbound message payload without errors.
